scss-builder.description: Build style package and generate css and source map files from scss

pnpm-workspace-list.description: The pnpm-workspace-list executor lists the names of all packages in a pnpm workspace. It provides a quick and easy way to view all package names within your Nx workspace.

scssify-token.description: convert JSON-based design tokens into SCSS variables, streamlining the integration of design systems into stylesheets.
